headline: A Look At Southwest Airlines (LUV) Valuation After JPMorgan Double Upgrade And 2026 Guidance Optimism
summary: JPMorgan’s double upgrade of Southwest Airlines (LUV) from Underweight to Overweight ahead of its upcoming earnings report and 2026 guidance has pushed the stock into focus, as investors weigh optimism against already strong recent returns. See our latest analysis for Southwest Airlines. The JPMorgan upgrade lands after a strong run, with Southwest’s 90 day share price return of 42.28% and 1 year total shareholder return of 37.36% pointing to clear positive momentum. This is supported by...
